# SpeedWurdz - Multiplayer Word Game

This is a Node.js web application that implements a multiplayer word game similar to Bananagrams.

## Project Structure
- **Frontend**: HTML/CSS/JavaScript with real-time Socket.io client
- **Backend**: Node.js with Express server and Socket.io for multiplayer communication
- **Features**: User lobby system, table management, real-time multiplayer gameplay

## Development Guidelines
- Use modern JavaScript (ES6+) features
- Implement responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Follow real-time multiplayer best practices
- Maintain clean separation between lobby and game logic
- Use Socket.io rooms for table/game isolation

## Key Components
- Lobby system with user presence
- Table creation and joining
- Username management
- Real-time updates for active users and tables
